Body: I am using a Micromax Canvas A116. It's not a rooted phone. I've done a factory-reset, but still malware app existing. How to remove monkey test, time service in mobile phone? And everytime phone gets reboot and unwanted apps like get touch, paytm etc., get installed. How to resolve this? Screenshot (click to enlarge)I tried all the possible ways suggested in this
Title: How to remove monkey test and time service?

history.Text: I am using micromax canvas A116 . ***It's not a rooted phone.*** I done set refactory but still malware app existing. How to remove monkey test, time service in mobile phone? I am using a *Micromax Canvas A116.* ***It's not a rooted phone.*** I've done a factory-reset, but still malware app existing. How to remove monkey test, time service in mobile phone? And everytime phone gets reboot and unwanted apps like get touch, paytm etc., get installed. How to resolve this?    [![screenshot][1]][2]  Screenshot (click to enlarge)  [1]: http://i.stack.imgur.com/hnNKTm.png  [2]: http://i.stack.imgur.com/hnNKT.png I tried all the possible ways [suggested in this](http://android.stackexchange.com/a/120368/43602)
